message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me in the middle?
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I can meet you halfway, but I'll need to get $110 for the product. What do you think?
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you at $105. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your flexibility, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you at $110, but I need to get a bit closer to my target. How about $108?
I'm getting close, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Can you meet me at $105? I think that's as low as I can go.
